basics.name: Min Jun Han
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk
Provided exceptional customer service by handling dine-in and take-out orders
Efficiently managed the line during peak hours to streamline orders and reduce wait times

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.6 or higher at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Seal of Biliteracy
awards.summary: Seal awarded to those who completed all four years of a language and passed the cumulative test.
